actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill authorizing the removal of a rock ledge and certain other material in the Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy, New Jersey.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to remove material in Arthur Kill, New Jersey, as part of the navigation project.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the removal of a rock ledge and certain other material in the Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy, New Jersey.
